Alternate Title: So that your children will no longer know the horrors of the war, subscribe to the National Loan.
Creator: Redon, Georges, 1869-1943, artist
Description: Poster showing a mother cuddling her child before putting her to bed.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
